Description: Fragment of foot, with concave outer face, of Attic black-glazed pottery kylix; glazed black on exterior and underside; reserved outer face of foot and resting surface; pre-firing ligature on resting surface.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 495)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1514)
